values.title: Winston S Churchill
values.desc: Success is not final failure is not fatal it is the courage to continue that counts

values.title: Herbert Bayard Swope
values.desc: I cant give you a surefire formula for success but I can give you a formula for failure try to please everybody all the time

values.title: WC Fields
values.desc: If at first you dont succeed try try again Then quit No use being a damn fool about it

values.title: Albert Einstein
values.desc: Try not to become a man of success Rather become a man of value

values.title: Herman Melville
values.desc: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation

values.title: W P Kinsella
values.desc: Success is getting what you want happiness is wanting what you get

values.title: Roy T Bennett The Light in the Heart
values.desc: Success is not how high you have climbed but how you make a positive difference to the world

values.title: Truman Capote
values.desc: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor

values.title: Salvador Dali
values.desc: Have no fear of perfection  youll never reach it

values.title: Winston S Churchill
values.desc: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm

values.title: Bette Midler
values.desc: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you

values.title: Coco Chanel
values.desc: Dont spend time beating on a wall hoping to transform it into a door

values.title: Steve Maraboli
values.desc: Cry Forgive Learn Move on Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness

values.title: Roy T Bennett The Light in the Heart
values.desc: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others

values.title: Walt Disney
values.desc: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing

values.title: Hayley Williams
values.desc: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand

values.title: Mark Twain
values.desc: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence then success is sure

values.title: Theodore Roosevelt
values.desc: It is hard to fail but it is worse never to have tried to succeed
